(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Advertorial)))


root(ROOT-0, Advertorial-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP We))
      (ADVP (DT all))
      (VP (VBP know)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN importance))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN blood) (NN bank))
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (NNP Singapore))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP am)
        (ADJP (JJ sure)
          (SBAR
            (S
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (NN lot))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (PRP us))))
              (VP (MD would) (RB n't)
                (VP (VB mind)
                  (S
                    (VP (VBG giving)
                      (NP (NN blood)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(know-3, We-1)
advmod(know-3, all-2)
root(ROOT-0, know-3)
det(importance-5, the-4)
dobj(know-3, importance-5)
prep(importance-5, of-6)
det(bank-9, the-7)
nn(bank-9, blood-8)
pobj(of-6, bank-9)
prep(bank-9, in-10)
pobj(in-10, Singapore-11)
cc(know-3, and-12)
nsubj(sure-15, I-13)
cop(sure-15, am-14)
conj(know-3, sure-15)
det(lot-17, a-16)
nsubj(mind-22, lot-17)
prep(lot-17, of-18)
pobj(of-18, us-19)
aux(mind-22, would-20)
neg(mind-22, n't-21)
ccomp(sure-15, mind-22)
xcomp(mind-22, giving-23)
dobj(giving-23, blood-24)


(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (ADVP (RB usually))
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN thing))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WDT that))
        (S
          (VP (VBZ holds)
            (NP (PRP us))
            (ADVP (RB back))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN lack))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (NN opportunity))))
        (CONJP (RB as) (RB well) (IN as))
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN fear))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (NN needle))))))
    (. .)))


cc(lack-11, But-1)
advmod(lack-11, usually-2)
det(thing-4, the-3)
nsubj(lack-11, thing-4)
nsubj(holds-6, that-5)
rcmod(thing-4, holds-6)
dobj(holds-6, us-7)
advmod(holds-6, back-8)
cop(lack-11, is-9)
det(lack-11, the-10)
root(ROOT-0, lack-11)
prep(lack-11, of-12)
pobj(of-12, opportunity-13)
advmod(well-15, as-14)
cc(lack-11, well-15)
mwe(well-15, as-16)
det(fear-18, the-17)
conj(lack-11, fear-18)
prep(fear-18, of-19)
det(needle-21, the-20)
pobj(of-19, needle-21)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Well))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Well-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (CD one) (JJ good) (NN way))
      (PP (IN of)
        (S
          (VP (VBG overcoming)
            (NP (DT this))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP
            (VP (VB rally)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (NN couple))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNS friends))))
              (ADVP (RB together)))
            (CC and)
            (VP (VB do)
              (NP (PRP it))
              (PP (IN as)
                (NP (DT a) (NN team) (NN effort))))))))
    (. .)))


num(way-3, one-1)
amod(way-3, good-2)
nsubj(is-7, way-3)
prep(way-3, of-4)
pcomp(of-4, overcoming-5)
dobj(overcoming-5, this-6)
root(ROOT-0, is-7)
aux(rally-9, to-8)
xcomp(is-7, rally-9)
det(couple-11, a-10)
dobj(rally-9, couple-11)
prep(couple-11, of-12)
pobj(of-12, friends-13)
advmod(rally-9, together-14)
cc(rally-9, and-15)
conj(rally-9, do-16)
dobj(do-16, it-17)
prep(do-16, as-18)
det(effort-21, a-19)
nn(effort-21, team-20)
pobj(as-18, effort-21)

  (S

      (PP (IN in)
        (NP (NNS numbers))))
    (VP (VBZ is)

    (, ,)))

  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB so))
    (SBAR
      (WHADVP (WRB when))
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (VBP go)
          (PP (IN with)
            (NP (NNS others))))
        (, ,)))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB usually))
      (NP
        (ADJP
          (ADJP (RBR less) (JJ daunting))
          (CC and)
          (ADJP
            (NP (DT a) (RB lot))
            (JJR more)))
        (NN fun)))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP they))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (ADVP (RB also))
      (VP
        (VP (VBG playing)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN role))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (DT the) (NNP SDU)))))
        (CC and)
        (VP (VBG getting)
          (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ prospective) (NNS participants))
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB signup)
                (PP (IN on)
                  (NP (PRP$ their) (NNP Facebook) (NN account)))
                (SBAR (RB so) (IN that)
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP we))
                    (VP (MD can)
                      (VP (VB get)
                        (S
                          (VP (TO to)
                            (VP (VB meet)
                              (NP (JJ new) (NNS friends))
                              (ADVP (RB as) (RB well)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(playing-4, they-1)
aux(playing-4, are-2)
advmod(playing-4, also-3)
root(ROOT-0, playing-4)
det(role-6, the-5)
dobj(playing-4, role-6)
prep(role-6, of-7)
det(SDU-9, the-8)
pobj(of-7, SDU-9)
cc(playing-4, and-10)
conj(playing-4, getting-11)
poss(participants-14, our-12)
amod(participants-14, prospective-13)
dobj(getting-11, participants-14)
aux(signup-16, to-15)
xcomp(getting-11, signup-16)
prep(signup-16, on-17)
poss(account-20, their-18)
nn(account-20, Facebook-19)
pobj(on-17, account-20)

mark(get-25, that-22)
nsubj(get-25, we-23)
aux(get-25, can-24)

  (SINV (RB So)
    (VP (VBP do)
      (NP (NN visit)))
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NNP Event) (NNP Microsite))
      (PP (IN by)
        (S
          (VP (VBG clicking)
            (ADVP (RB here)))
          (, ,))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP
      (VP (VB Join)
        (NP (DT the) (NN community)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB make)
        (NP (NN history))
        (PP (IN by)
          (S
            (VP (VBG being)
              (NP
                (NP (NN part))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP
                    (NP (NNP Singapore) (POS 's))
                    (JJ first) (NN blogger) (NN blood) (NN donation) (NN drive)))))))))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Join-1)
det(community-3, the-2)
dobj(Join-1, community-3)
cc(Join-1, and-4)
conj(Join-1, make-5)
dobj(make-5, history-6)
prep(make-5, by-7)
cop(part-9, being-8)
pcomp(by-7, part-9)
prep(part-9, of-10)
poss(drive-17, Singapore-11)
possessive(Singapore-11, 's-12)
amod(drive-17, first-13)
nn(drive-17, blogger-14)
nn(drive-17, blood-15)
nn(drive-17, donation-16)
pobj(of-10, drive-17)
